sentence.Network_en: Unfortunately, there is little prospect of seeing these big questions answered.
sentence.Network_cn: 不幸的是，几乎不可能看到这些重大问题得到回复。

sentence.Network_en: Catching colds is unfortunately an occupational hazard in this profession.
sentence.Network_cn: 不幸的是，容易感冒是这个行业的职业性风险。

sentence.Network_en: Unfortunately, Grandma always seems to awaken at awkward moments.
sentence.Network_cn: 不幸的是，奶奶好像总是醒来的不是时候。

真题网 - 考研英语高频词汇 ... unexpected a. 想不到的，意外的 unfortunately ad. 不幸地；遗憾的是 unknown a. 未知的，不知名的.
未分类 - - Nicolas’ Blog - Upholstery ... unformatted a. 无格式的 unfortunately ad. 不幸，遗憾地 union 联合.

list.abs: Character  - Chinese Character... ... 七高八低[ bumpy] 山高水低[ something unfortunate] 手高手低[ small difference].
温暖圣诞节《老友记》第二季学习笔记在线收看... ... we just call it the 'unfortunate incident 不幸事件'? brownies 呈褐色的.
性感英语词汇(下) | CFC中文网 ... Unfortunately not. 可惜，没有哦。 You have good taste. 你（对事物）的感觉很好。.
不要错过：&g... ... You seem nervous.( 你好像很紧张。) That's unfortunate.( 真够倒霉的。) My wife left me.( 我妻子离开了我。).

entry.tran: 不幸的是；遗憾的是；令人失望的是
entry.def: You can use unfortunately to introduce or refer to a statement when you consider that it is sad or disappointing, or when you want to express regret.

example.tran: 可惜的是，我的时间有限。

example.ex: Unfortunately for the Prince, his title brought obligations as well as privileges...
example.tran: 可惜对于王子来说，封号赋予他特权的同时也给他带来了义务。

auth_sentence.content: This, unfortunately, is one of those albums.
auth_sentence.res_content: This, unfortunately, is one of those albums.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This, unfortunately, is one of those albums.

auth_sentence.content: Unfortunately it came too late to save the band.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unfortunately it came too late to save the band.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unfortunately it came too late to save the band.

auth_sentence.content: Unfortunately Neighborhood Watch isn't going to do it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unfortunately Neighborhood Watch isn't going to do it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unfortunately Neighborhood Watch isn't going to do it.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
